input_args.instruction: "Context: The context mentions that Gene HLA-B associates with Disease diffuse large B-cell lymphoma and Disease Takayasu's arteritis. \n\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma and Takayasu's arteritis.
